abstract: The shock waves were felt several miles from the factory. At least eight people were injured, two critically.
lead_paragraph: MADRID â€” An explosion and fire at a petrochemical factory in Catalonia on Tuesday killed at least one person and injured several more, prompting officials to block roads, suspend rail service and order nearby residents to stay inside.
keywords: Industrias Quimicas del Oxido de Etileno SA (Iqoxe)
